mng: precious thing, treasure, culinary delicacy, rare, valuable, to value highly

exm.mng: precious, extremely valuable, (honorific) Please take good care of yourself!
Li Shizhen (1518-1593), Ming botanist and pharmacologist, author of Compendium of Medical Herbs 本草綱目|本草纲目[Ben3 cao3 Gang1 mu4]
to treasure, to value, to cherish
oddity, news tidbits, strange and interesting item
